text: Alberto Grimaldi (28 March 1925 â€“ 23 January 2021) was an Italian movie producer. He was born in Naples, Italy. He was known for producing the movies: For a Few Dollars More, The Good, the Bad and the Ugly, Last Tango in Paris and Gangs of New York. Grimaldi died on 23 January 2021 in Miami, Florida at the age of 95. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1925 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Italian movie producers Category:Movie people from Naples
title: Alberto Grimaldi
